title: VideoSort
blurb: Fast, deterministic video library sorting & tagging â€” by codec, resolution, audio, content, hashes, and rules.
description: VideoSort consolidates scattered video files into a consistent, searchable library. It extracts deep metadata via ffprobe, computes cryptographic and perceptual hashes, supports ML-assisted labeling (optional), and performs deterministic renames/moves using safe, dry-run-first workflows. Outputs include folder structures, sidecars (JSON/CSV/NDJSON), and HTML reports.

versions.notes: Perceptual hashing and near-duplicate detection; HTML report export.
